links.url: /Library Files/I Series/It Pays To Be Ignorant/
links.label: Library Files

infos.info: Hickerson writes that there is some doubt on the date when the program switched from Saturdays to Sundays during 2/28/48-7/17/49.
Walt Pattinson has a log for the series.
